sentences.sContent: The flight will be announced soon. Meanwhile, please remain seated.
sentences.sCn: 很快就要广播通知登机，在此期间请继续留在座位上。

sentences.sContent: I knew I wouldn’t get my exam results for several weeks, and I wasn’t sure what to do in the meanwhile.
sentences.sCn: 我知道我要几星期后才能拿到考试成绩，我不知道这期间该做什么。

trans.tranOther: in the period of time between two events
